name: Kevin Flórez
description: '''Kevin Flórez''' (born '''Kevin Rafael Flórez Rodríguez''', August 19, 1991) is a Colombian singer-songwriter. For his work in the urban [[champeta]] genre, he has won several local and national awards. He is known for songs like "La Invité a Bailar" (2013), "Con Ella" (2013), and "La Pikotera" (2019).
